name: livestream-server
description: A conference call implementation using WebRTC, Socket.io and Node.js.

scripts.deploy: npm install && cd code-compiler && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && xcopy .\code-compiler\build .\build\ /D /E /Y && move build\index.html build\app.html && cd src && node app.js

author: Amir Sanni <amirsanni@gmail.com>
